data.title: Independent School in Hudson Valley NY
data.meta_description: At Tuxedo Park School, the Secondary School Placement Process is individualized and personalized. Learn about matriculation at our Hudson Valley private school!
data.text:
Beginning in Grade 6, each student meets regularly with the Secondary School Placement team to support them as they complete a self-assessment, participate in workshops, attend Secondary School Fairs, take practice standardized tests, visit schools, and schedule interviews. Highly developed traits of character, including curiosity and confidence serve TPS students well as they prepare to approach this important chapter in their educational journey.

Our students’ long-standing experience with public speaking allows them to interact with high school admissions officers with ease and poise. Mock interviews with administrators and faculty afford them the opportunity to fine-tune their ability to speak about themselves with both high regard and humility, not an easy task. By the time our students write their essays and step into an admissions interview, they are ready!

When the search is successfully completed, students from TPS attend a variety of schools that best match their abilities and criteria, often enrolling in their first or second choice school. In our discussions with admissions officers, we consistently hear how highly regarded our students are, both in character and academics. Students across school type place into honors or AP courses. Their work habits are strong and they are emotionally prepared to face the challenges of high school. We are very proud of our graduates and their accomplishments at TPS, in secondary school, and beyond…
